MAIN_MESSAGE: It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 5PM in the CH63 postcode area of Wirral following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our emergency response team are currently en route to site and will carry out investigations and commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:47PM on 15th March 2021
